knimeNode.name: Channel History
knimeNode.shortDescription: Get the channel history for the defined channel (version )

fullDescription.intro:
Gets the history of the specified channel (version 2). A maximum of 1000 messages will be retrieved.
This node requires a user OAuth token. For more details see https://api.slack.com/methods/conversations.history
The following scopes must be set: channels:history, channels:read and groups:history.
fullDescription.option: The OAth token, this must be a user token a bot token will not work with this node.

ports.outPort: The channel history for the selected channel
